name: dataset_name
description: Dataset filename.

name: platform_id
description: Identifier for the GOES satellite. Possible values are "G16" and "G17". Currently, "G16".

name: orbital_slot
description: Designated operating slot for the satellite. Possible values are "GOES-East", "GOES-West", "GOES-Test", and "GOES-Storage". Currently, "GOES-East".

name: timeline_id
description: ABI scanning mode of operation. Possible values are "ABI Mode 3" and "ABI Mode 4". Full Disk images are generated in ABI scanning Mode 3 and 4, while Mesoscale and CONUS images are only generated in ABI scanning Mode 3.

name: scene_id
description: One of three geographic coverage regions imaged by ABI. Possible values are "Full Disk", "CONUS", and "Mesoscale".

name: time_coverage_start
description: Date and time of the first data point in the dataset (UTC). Format is YYYY-MM-DD”T”HH:MM:SS.s”Z”.

name: time_coverage_end
description: Date and time of the last data point in the dataset (UTC). Format is YYYY-MM-DD”T”HH:MM:SS.s”Z”.

name: date_created
description: Date and time when dataset file was created (UTC). Format is YYYY-MM-DD”T”HH:MM:SS.s”Z”.

name: geospatial_westbound_longitude
description: Westernmost longitude in decimal degrees covered by the dataset.

name: geospatial_northbound_latitude
description: Northernmost latitude in decimal degrees covered by the dataset.

name: geospatial_eastbound_longitude
description: Easternmost longitude in decimal degrees covered by the dataset.

name: geospatial_southbound_latitude
description: Southernmost latitude in decimal degrees covered by the dataset.

name: nominal_satellite_subpoint_lon
description: Longitude of satellite subpoint in decimal degrees.

name: outlier_pixel_count_c01
description: Number of band 1 cloud and moisture imagery pixels with values outside the valid measurement range.

name: outlier_pixel_count_c02
description: Number of band 2 cloud and moisture imagery pixels with values outside the valid measurement range.

name: outlier_pixel_count_c03
description: Number of band 3 cloud and moisture imagery pixels with values outside the valid measurement range.

name: min_reflectance_factor_c01
description: Minimum reflectance factor value for band 1 of good and conditionally usable quality pixels.

description: Maximum reflectance factor value for band 1 of good and conditionally usable quality pixels.

description: Mean reflectance factor value for band 1 of good and conditionally usable quality pixels.

name: std_dev_reflectance_factor_c01
description: Standard deviation of reflectance factor values for band 1 of good and conditionally usable quality pixels.

name: percent_uncorrectable_grb_errors

description: Location in Google Cloud Storage for the underlying source file.
